JOB DESCRIPTION:
Minimum 6 Years of Experience in J2EE development. 

Exposure to SDLC,  minimum 1 life cycle experience. 

Tech Stack (Laravel,  Dot NET,  Scala,  Angular,  Node JS,  Mongo DB,  Python,  Grafana,  etc). Responsibilities: 

Work with Seniors to building scalable,  reliable,  high- performing platforms. 

Be an active team player in developing complex product features focused on design,  coding,  testing,  and end- user experience. 

Maintain a high service level in terms of security,  performance,  availability,  and quality,  and help with recovery and support in the event of emergencies. 

Establish and spread good development practices to create a top- class,  results- oriented engineering culture: automated testing,  code review,  etc. Required Skills & Experience: 

B- Tech or equivalent degree from prominent institute. 

Experience in J2EE and related technologies. 

In- depth understanding of MVC frameworks like Laravel,  Spring/ SpringBoot,  JPA,  Hibernate. 

Must be aware of modern web practices like REST,  HTML,  HTTP Fundamentals. 

Experience working in a Linux or other Unix- like environment. 

Experience with modern development practices and processes: use of source code control (Git),  automated unit testing,  CI,  agile development (Scrum /  Kanban). 

Shows initiative and drives topics to resolution in a high level of quality,  speed,  reliability,  and efficiency. 

Collaborates with team members and stakeholders and shares expertise to ensure product success.
